text: Kristin Turcotte, née Holman (born in Toronto, Ontario, Canada) is a Canadian curler. She is a and . ==Personal life== Turcotte is married to fellow curler Bob Turcotte.https://www.whitbycurlingclub.com/~whitbycu/images/files/Newsletters/2013-01%20newsletter.pdf ==Teams and events== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
